title.text: Electronic Dictionaries and Linguistic Analysis of Italian Large Corpora

Introduction We present the system of Itahan morphological dictionaries (the DELI system) which has been developed at the Department of Commumcatl0n Science of the Umverslty of Salerno We wdl see how these dictionaries can be employed m order to index a text Finally, we w~ll examine the construction of local grammars whlch, interacting with dictionaries, allow precise tagging of sequences of words 1.
